snippet.title: Oh, Deer! Alpha trailer
snippet.description:
We made the last PlayStation Mobile game. It's 49 cents. You can play it on your Vita. It's a short but replayable arcade-style driving game, with a heavy emphasis on snappy drifting. Hit all the deer, or don't! I can't tell you what to do!

Give us feedback here! www.necrosoftgames.com/oh-deer
Or here! www.twitter.com/necrosoftgames
Or here! http://forum.necrosoftgames.com

Keep in mind this is an alpha build. There may be small abnormalities - treat it like Early Access for PlayStation, maybe. Have fun!!

[UPDATE! PSM has closed, but you can still buy the game from your vita browser, here! http://p0.dl.playstation.net/p0/psns/psnschk.htm?a=psns%3Abrowse%3Fproduct%3DUM0181-NPNA00289_00-0000000000000000&type=psm ]
